thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: The 10-Point.

author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning,
Escalation
President Trump is threatening to escalate trade tensions further with Beijing, saying he was considering imposing tariffs on an additional $100 billion in imports from China. That would triple the amount of Chinese goods facing U.S. levies following the administration’s recent announcement of proposed tariffs on $50 billion in goods. The president said Thursday that such an escalation would be the result of Beijing’s “unfair retaliation” that could “harm our farmers and manufacturers.” Earlier this...
